definitionContent: Geographic JavaScrip Object Notation is an open standard format for encoding collections of simple geographical features along with their non-spatial attributes using JavaScript Object Notation.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - Miscellaneous Terms - GeoPlatform.gov

definitionContent: Geographic/Geospatial Information System is a computer system for providing access to and management of geospatial information.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - Miscellaneous Terms - GeoPlatform.gov
